00009  * Misc inventory items, basically things that have no use but can be

00014 {
00015   struct MCDTstruct
00016   {

00020            // set to 0. TODO: Check what this field corresponds to
00021            // in the editor.

00023   MCDTstruct data;
00024

00026 
00027   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00028   {
00029     model = esm.getHNString("MODL");
00030     name = esm.getHNOString("FNAM");
00031     esm.getHNT(data, "MCDT", 12);
00032     script = esm.getHNOString("SCRI");
00033     icon = esm.getHNOString("ITEX");
00034   }
